r.d: This extension allows you to access Oracle databases. It can be built with PHP 4.3.9 to 5.x. It can be linked with Oracle 9.2, 10.2, 11.1, or 11.2 client libraries.
r.n: Fixed bug #59985 (show normal warning text for OCI_NO_DATA) Fixed OCI8 part of bug #55748 (CVE-2011-4153: multiple NULL pointer dereferences with zend_strndup) Fixed OCI8 part of bug #55301 (multiple null pointer dereferences with calloc) Increased maximum Oracle error message buffer length for new Oracle 11.2.0.3 size Improve internal initalization failure error messages
